attributes.action: General Election in wake of the Prime Minister resigning ,after Brexit
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron poke outside Number 10 Downing Street announcing his resignation within 12 weeks after the Brexit Leave campaign won, The public should decide who becomes the next Prime Minister to lead us , Not the outcome of a Conservative Party leadership contest
attributes.background: A Prime Minister to be democratically elected by the public, instead of Conservative Party leadership contest to decide who leads us out of Europe
